Gang leaders direct cutthroats, killers, thieves, and toughs. The gang leader often appears alongside a [bandit gang](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3432) or other criminals. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 23 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18 [Gang Leader](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3618) **Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 160 **Perception** +14 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +17, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +17, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +17, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) +15, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +15 **Str** +4 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +2 **Wis** -1 **Cha** +4 **Items** [moderate glue bomb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3295), [lesser healing potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186), _+1 [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=398)_, [Sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72) (10 bullets), [studded leather](/Armor.aspx?ID=5) --- **AC** 24 **Fort** +13 **Ref** +17 **Will** +12 **HP** 110 **Deny Advantage** The gang leader isn't [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to creatures of 7th level or lower that are [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=79), [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=96), flanking, or using surprise attack.
**Evasive Reflexes** When the gang leader rolls a success on a Reflex save, they get a critical success instead.
**Nimble Dodge** **Trigger** The gang leader is targeted with an attack by an attacker they can see; **Effect** The gang leader gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** fist +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 1d4+10 bludgeoning **Melee** _shortsword_ +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d6+10 piercing **Ranged** sling +17 ([Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6+8 bludgeoning **Brutal Rally** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Trigger** The gang leader rolls a critical hit against a creature; **Effect** All allies that can see the gang leader gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls until the start of the gang leader's next turn. **Gang Up** Any enemy is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) against the gang leader's melee attacks due to flanking as long as the enemy is within melee reach of both the gang leader and one of the gang leader's allies. **Quick Draw** The gang leader Interacts to draw a weapon, then Strikes with that weapon. **Sneak Attack** The gang leader deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures. **Surprise Attacker** On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted are [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to the gang leader.
Gang Structure A gang leader might run a gang, and several other NPCs in this section and the [Criminal](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=533) section make for good gang members. A gang of significant size typically has a pyramid structure so that only a few members report directly to the boss and it's harder to link crimes directly to those in charge if someone gets arrested.
